javadoc:
Custom Ghidra URL class loader which exposes the addURL method so we can add to the classpath at runtime.

This class loader must be installed by setting the "java.system.class.loader" system property prior to launch (i.e., the JVM should be launched with the following argument: -Djava.system.class.loader=ghidra.GhidraClassLoader.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
This one-argument constructor is required for the JVM to successfully use this class loader
 via the java.system.class.loader system property.

params.name: parent
params.comment: The parent class loader for delegation

methods.name: addPath
methods.comment: Converts the specified path to a URL and adds it to the classpath.

return.comment:
True if the path was successfully added; otherwise, false.  Failure can occur if the 
   path is not able to be converted to a URL.

methods.name: appendToClassPathForInstrumentation
methods.comment:
VisualVM calls this to dynamically add things to the classpath.  
 
 NOTE: It is not required to be public.

params.name: path
params.comment: The path to be added to the search path of URLs.

name: GhidraClassLoader
comment:
Custom Ghidra URL class loader which exposes the addURL method so we can add to the classpath
 at runtime.  
 
 This class loader must be installed by setting the "java.system.class.loader" 
 system property prior to launch (i.e., the JVM should be launched with the following argument:
 -Djava.system.class.loader=ghidra.GhidraClassLoader.
